articles.author: KITV Web Staff
articles.title: Kolohe Kai's Roman De Peralta reacts to Iam Tongi singing his hit 'Cool Down' in American Idol finale - KITV Honolulu
articles.description: Most of Hawaii -- and millions more -- watched the American Idol finale on Sunday to see Kahuku's own Iam Tongi. But few were as excited as Roman De Peralta,
articles.content:
Roman of Kolohe Kai says American Idol called him a few days ago, telling him there was a chance Iam was going to sing "Cool Down", and asking for his permission.
HONOLULU (KITV4) -- Most of Hawaii … [+1426 chars]

articles.description: Lionel Richie, Ryan Seacrest and Katy Perry give their candid thoughts on Iam Tongi's "American Idol" season 21 win. Plus, hear Ian's reaction!Full Story: ht...
